M O R E - I N F O
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Drawn from recent discoveries in neuroscience and research in developmental 
psychology The Alchemy of Awareness is the story of a natural ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“alchemyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ that 
our brains perform in making a series of life-changing transitions.

Albert Einstein is reported to have observed that we can never solve a 
problem on the same level of awareness as that at which the problem was 
created. But what is awareness and what constitutes a level of awareness? 
And, if we knew a level of awareness when we saw one, how would the movement 
from one level to another be accomplished? It is these and other thorny questions 
that The Alchemy of Awareness attempts to address.
